topic.title: A system of karma for zeronet
topic.body:
First thing, i want to use zeronet as a normal net for everything, but as a mesh adhoc network too, like Briar or firechat.

 Second, we know it is anonymous but, can have some of karma for the ugly and violent trolls, dont you think? or any type of penalisation in my own pages on that kind of users ? it is possible, i want to learn all about this project, maybe can receive some way of "local" gamification, with the personal moral. What do you think?

topic.title: Github alternative inside zeronet?
topic.body: Hello, did you note that news about zeronet blocking countrys? it can be always a risk for any project, any alternative to github but in the p2p?

1552022585_1PqrpogAwPjPf9T7bJjWWAjzTaRQc.body:
> [nekololi](#comment_344_1FzZsDQdh8wk71bDLxURPzmAt2FXehoNAB): combine? people have used ipfs here to share stuff. there have been video streaming sites here on zeronet where the videos were hosted on ipfs.

Oh, where can i try it? this a very brutal technology for me, have a lot of curiosity by the way.

> [nekololi](#comment_344_1FzZsDQdh8wk71bDLxURPzmAt2FXehoNAB): combine? people have used ipfs here to share stuff. there have been video streaming sites here on zeronet where the videos were hosted on ipfs.

Where?

1564417888_1Hw7w7Swdeexw86XmyfMHLbsSpzzH.body:
> [filips](#comment_108_1LFu1BTScmY82HHtg3TY2jAuSrCYNsQWEY): I'm saying that for publicly hosted GitLab.com which most people use and it is most popular (although bad) alternative for GitHub in this case. [...]

Cool that Git Center thing, very very cool

> [mg0](#comment_82_1LbP2cNA6NkvuFJvs7McUmv9qGjkNqVkTa): You can always use something else than github, there's gitlab, gitgud.io, etc... and you can also host your own too. Now, in zeronet there's Git Center

I really enjoy that Git Center thing n.n
